worldpa 0.0.0.9000
  • Reference

Get ISO3 code of all World countries

Source: R/get_isocodes.R
get_isocodes.Rd

Get the ISO3 code of all World countries from the Protected Planet website (based on the UNEP classification).

get_isocodes()

Value

A data frame with 3 columns: - region, the regions of the world - country, the countries of the world - iso3, the iso3 code of countries

Details

A Internet connexion is required.

Examples

x <- get_isocodes()

head(x)
#>   region      country iso3
#> 1 Africa      Algeria  DZA
#> 2 Africa      Burundi  BDI
#> 3 Africa       Angola  AGO
#> 4 Africa     Botswana  BWA
#> 5 Africa        Benin  BEN
#> 6 Africa Burkina Faso  BFA

x[x[ , "region"] == "Africa", ]
#>    region                                      country iso3
#> 1  Africa                                      Algeria  DZA
#> 2  Africa                                      Burundi  BDI
#> 3  Africa                                       Angola  AGO
